resources.string: My name is Trevor holmes. I am @ years old, and am currently pursusing a career in programming.\nThis app is a combination of my 2 passions: Art and Programming. Basically, I want to have something flashy I can show to people. Please select any of the categories below to see a selection of my works, along with some information on each piece.
